description: You’ll feel immediately at home in this gourmet restaurant in Sappada, where Paolo Kratter and his family offer a warm welcome to guests. In the romantic setting of an elegant mountain hut on the edge of the village, skiers can enjoy simple, informal dishes at lunchtime (the ski slopes are just behind the restaurant), while in the evening the cuisine is more elaborate and of the highest quality. A true taste of the Dolomites!
